title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The U.S. naval blockade of Venezuela has cost $700 million already—and is rising by $9 million daily

items.title: How Zoning Laws Exacerbate the Loneliness Crisis

items.title: More Americans will die than be born in 2030, CBO predicts—leaving immigrants as the only source of population growth

items.title: New Science: You’re Thinking About Self-Control Completely Backwards
